WorkItem.ClosedComment: Sounds like a PEAR problem... Please post the bug here: http://pear.php.net/package/Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer/redirected
WorkItem.Description:
Hello, thanks for reading.
 
Well, I created an excel file wtih PHPExcel5 and saved it in a folder. But when I tried to open in my cellphone, the file seems to be protected or with errors, but when I opened it in my PC, it has no problems. If I open the file and save it with another name, and then when I try to open the file in my cellphone, it opens. What can be the problem here??  Thanks a lot.
 
I attach the file generated, it can be opened by blackberry or iphone.
WorkItem.Summary: Can't open excel file in Iphone, Blackberry or others, but in PC has no problem
